languages.text: {n}Инцендия избегает встречаться с вами взглядом. Нервно дернув щекой, она произносит:{/n} "Я на время прекратила свое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}отшельничество{/d}, чтобы пожелать тебе доброго пути".

{n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия избегает встречаться с вами взглядом. Нервно дернув щекой, она произносит:{/n} "Я на время прекратила свое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}отшельничество{/d}, чтобы пожелать тебе доброго пути".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids meeting your eye. Her cheek twitches nervously and she says, with a bitter grin,{/n} "As you can see, I have learned nothing. Condemned a few more people so I could help you in battle."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids meeting your eye. Her cheek twitches nervously and she says, with a bitter grin,{/n} "As you can see, I have learned nothing. Condemned a few more people so I could help you in battle."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my exile so I can wish you luck on your travels."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my exile so I can wish you luck on your travels."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅避开了你的视线，脸颊紧张地抽动着。{/n}“为了前来祝你旅途顺利，我暂时停止了自我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}流亡{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅避开了你的视线，脸颊紧张地抽动着。{/n}“为了前来祝你旅途顺利，我暂时停止了自我流亡。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia meidet es, deinem Blick zu begegnen. Ihre Wange zuckt nervös, als sie sagt:{/n} "Ich habe mein {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}Exil{/d} für kurze Zeit ausgesetzt, um Euch viel Glück auf Euren Reisen zu wünschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia meidet es, deinem Blick zu begegnen. Ihre Wange zuckt nervös, als sie sagt:{/n} "Ich habe mein Exil für kurze Zeit ausgesetzt, um Euch viel Glück auf Euren Reisen zu wünschen."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia evita tu mirada. Su mejilla se crispa por los nervios al hablar.{/n} «He suspendido provisionalmente mi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exilio{/d} para venir a desearle suerte en su travesía».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia evita tu mirada. Su mejilla se crispa por los nervios al hablar.{/n} «He suspendido provisionalmente mi exilio para venir a desearle suerte en su travesía».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia évite de croiser votre regard. Sa joue tremble nerveusement quand elle vous parle :{/n} « J'ai brièvement suspendu mon {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exil{/d} pour vous souhaiter bonne chance dans vos expéditions. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia évite de croiser votre regard. Sa joue tremble nerveusement quand elle vous parle :{/n} « J'ai brièvement suspendu mon exil pour vous souhaiter bonne chance dans vos expéditions. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}インセンディアはあなたと目を合わせるのを避けている。言いながら、彼女の頬は緊張して引き攣る。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}放浪{/d}を一時中断した。お前の旅の幸運を祈ることができるかと思ってな」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアはあなたと目を合わせるのを避けている。言いながら、彼女の頬は緊張して引き攣る。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}放浪{/d}を一時中断した。お前の旅の幸運を祈ることができるかと思ってな」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}İncendia, seninle göz göze gelmekten kaçınıyor. Yanakları gergince seyiriyor.{/n} "Sana iyi yolculuklar dilemek için {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}sürgünümü{/d} geçici olarak durdurdum."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia avoids locking eyes with you. Her cheek twitches nervously as she says,{/n} "I have briefly suspended my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}exile{/d} in order to wish you luck on your travels."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia seninle göz göze gelmekten kaçınıyor. Yanakları gergince seyiriyor.{/n} "Size iyi yolculuklar dilemek için {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaExile}sürgünümü{/d} kısa bir süreliğine durdurdum."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion
